<SectionDefinition>

## Typedefs

### LLVMPassBuilderOptionsRef {#gab96a23e2cec5c8e689f952c7c9daadb9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>typedef typedefLLVM&#95;C&#95;EXTERN&#95;C&#95;BEGIN struct LLVMOpaquePassBuilderOptions&#42; LLVMPassBuilderOptionsRef</>}>
A set of options passed which are attached to the Pass Manager upon run.

This corresponds to an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmpassbuilderoptions">llvm::LLVMPassBuilderOptions</a> instance

The details for how the different properties of this structure are used can be found in the source for LLVMRunPasses

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/include/llvm-c/transforms/passbuilder-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/include/llvm-c/transforms/passbuilder-h">PassBuilder.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### LLVMCreatePassBuilderOptions() {#ga0fe3fac04d1cb0d18d24b194794678ac}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="LLVMPassBuilderOptionsRef LLVMCreatePassBuilderOptions (void)">
Create a new set of options for a PassBuilder.

Ownership of the returned instance is given to the client, and they are responsible for it. The client should call LLVMDisposePassBuilderOptions to free the pass builder options.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/include/llvm-c/transforms/passbuilder-h/#l00070">70</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/include/llvm-c/transforms/passbuilder-h">PassBuilder.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#l00119">119</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp">PassBuilderBindings.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LLVMDisposePassBuilderOptions (<a href="#gab96a23e2cec5c8e689f952c7c9daadb9">LLVMPassBuilderOptionsRef</a> Options)</>}>

### LLVMPassBuilderOptionsSetAAPipeline() {#gab90315ff95335ee7bd709a1d57096083}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LLVMPassBuilderOptionsSetAAPipeline (<a href="#gab96a23e2cec5c8e689f952c7c9daadb9">LLVMPassBuilderOptionsRef</a> Options, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; AAPipeline)</>}>
Specify a custom alias analysis pipeline for the PassBuilder to be used instead of the default one.

The string argument is not copied; the caller is responsible for ensuring it outlives the PassBuilderOptions instance.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/include/llvm-c/transforms/passbuilder-h/#l00090">90</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/include/llvm-c/transforms/passbuilder-h">PassBuilder.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#l00133">133</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp">PassBuilderBindings.cpp</a>.

### LLVMRunPasses() {#gae3e632706254c18142e979ad1aec63a9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMErrorRef LLVMRunPasses (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gad1d1bb5f901c903a0cf09c5a053c9c56">LLVMModuleRef</a> M, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; Passes, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmctarget/#ga2fd34441d1fdf9466981c6c95caea314">LLVMTargetMachineRef</a> TM, <a href="#gab96a23e2cec5c8e689f952c7c9daadb9">LLVMPassBuilderOptionsRef</a> Options)</>}>
Construct and run a set of passes over a module.

This function takes a string with the passes that should be used. The format of this string is the same as opt&#39;s -passes argument for the new pass manager. Individual passes may be specified, separated by commas. Full pipelines may also be invoked using <code>default&lt;O3&gt;</code> and friends. See opt for full reference of the Passes format.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/include/llvm-c/transforms/passbuilder-h/#l00049">49</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/include/llvm-c/transforms/passbuilder-h">PassBuilder.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#l00101">101</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp">PassBuilderBindings.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### LLVMRunPassesOnFunction() {#gaf31caae4259f8aaaac2d6cc296a3c952}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMErrorRef LLVMRunPassesOnFunction (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> F, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; Passes, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmctarget/#ga2fd34441d1fdf9466981c6c95caea314">LLVMTargetMachineRef</a> TM, <a href="#gab96a23e2cec5c8e689f952c7c9daadb9">LLVMPassBuilderOptionsRef</a> Options)</>}>
Construct and run a set of passes over a function.

This function behaves the same as LLVMRunPasses, but operates on a single function instead of an entire module.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/include/llvm-c/transforms/passbuilder-h/#l00059">59</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/include/llvm-c/transforms/passbuilder-h">PassBuilder.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#l00110">110</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp">PassBuilderBindings.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
